poster: M î s t a k e
title: League Client resolution on Mac can't be changed!
body:
Hello fellow summoners, this is gonna be my first time posting on this community so I hope this situation gets solved ASAP. My problem isn't really a big deal tho, but I just want to know if there is a fix on it. So here it is. My League Client (the one that we use on buying champs, etc [not the in-game client]), used to be 1200x800 on size. And now it's stuck at 1024x576. I can't seem to change the resolution at all and it only displays 1 option, the 1024x576. Is there anyway I can restore the old one (1200x800)? This really affects me as a person with OCD and I can't help it xddd. I can provide the specs of my Macbook if needed. Thanks in advance! 

P.S. I don't know how to attach an image file so if anyone of you would let me know that, it would be great and much appreciated. TY

replies.body: Resetting your config to default should restore your original resolution.  Try out the [config reset steps](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues#mq2) in this guide to perform that reset.  @helps

replies.poster: M î s t a k e
replies.body: Thanks for the reply! Will try it and hopefully it works!
